Parameters: The new standby state. One of the constants @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast#STANDBY_STATE_UNKNOWN_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast#STANDBY_STATE_NO_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast#STANDBY_STATE_YES_E@.
onStandbyStateChanged(int).Description: Called when the standby state of the device has changed.

Parameters: The new active-input state. One of the constants @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast#ACTIVE_INPUT_STATE_UNKNOWN_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast#ACTIVE_INPUT_STATE_NO_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast#ACTIVE_INPUT_STATE_YES_E@.
onActiveInputStateChanged(int).Description: Called when the active-input state of the device has changed.

Parameters: The new application metadata. May be null if no application is currently running.
onApplicationMetadataChanged(com.google..Description: Called when the application metadata of the currently running receiver application has changed. This will happen whenever a receiver application launches or terminates.

onVolumeChanged().Description: Called when the device's volume or mute state has changed.

onApplicationStatusChanged().Description: Called when the status of the connected application has changed.

Parameters: A status code indicating the reason for the disconnect. One of the error constants defined in @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastStatusCodes_E@.
onApplicationDisconnected(int).Description: Called when the connection to the receiver application has been lost, such as when another client has launched a new application.

ClassDesc: The list of @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#Cast_E@ callbacks. These callbacks may get called at any time, when connected to a Google Cast device.
